title: Show of hands. Who wants lore to impact gameplay?
body:
I'm talking new game mode, picking factions, Earing honor for them, Being locked into restricted comps because of allegiances, Exclusive skins, events like Yas and Riv that have impact on the story's outcome, the whole 9 yards.

I love stuff like this, Id love lore to **actually matter for once** in a moba.
